Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ClientGUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ClientGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class ClientGUI extends Object implements View
class ClientGUI for the graphical interface of the game

    • serverSavedUsername

      public void serverSavedUsername(String name, boolean b, String token, boolean first)
      method serverSavedUsername used to save the player's username and to pass it to the controller, along with other useful parameters.
      Specified by:
      serverSavedUsername in interface View
      Parameters:
      name - - username chosen by the player
      b - - boolean signalling whether the login has been successful or not (meaning, if the username used was valid or not)
      token - - token used to identify the player
      first - - boolean signalling whether the player is the first to connect to the server or not

      name - - the name of the player whose turn it is.

    • turnPhase

      public void turnPhase()
      Method turnPhase is used to print the current turn phase. If it's the player's turn, it will guide him through the commands he can use. If it's not the player's turn, it will display a message saying whose turn it is.
      Specified by:
      turnPhase in interface View

      public void nextAction(int num, ArrayList<Position> tiles)

      nextAction in interface View
      Parameters:
      num - - the number of the turn phase.
